short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Distracting websites on the block list will be automatically closed after the time specified in the option page!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Close distracting websites after a certain period of time! The extension will scan all the tabs every two minutes. If it found any tab shown on your block list, it will close that tab after the time specified in the option page. Customize your block list in the option page.
